name: Pokemon Showdown Jirachi Style
description: This is a skin based around Jirachi, I like it :3. You can use it, i dont care LAWL. Have fun and PM me if you want me to do something like this for you :3 I dont know if this will work on servers, i never tested it.

user.name: Serene Thoughts
user.about:
Hi, im Serene Thoughts or BT Cant Get Burns, i like making CSS: 3 you can use them as long as i get the credit that is due, pm me on PS or Stylish if you want me to make you one :3

Allow Credit is given to the people who make these pictures, i dont make the pictures, but i make the skins, to name on of my favorite designers of pokemon drawings is Ishmam, all credits to him for the brilliant artwork he lets us use.

If you have any questions, feel free to pm me here or on PS: BT Cant Get Burns

Have a great day :3

additional_info: Plans: Nothing, i like it and i hope you do to :3
